resources.string: This device does not support Bluetooth
This device does not support Bluetooth Low Energy
Please, turn on the Bluetooth on the device
Bluetooth scan permission must be granted to use the app
Bluetooth scan permission has been denied.\n It can be granted from app settings to use the app
Bluetooth connect permission must be granted to use the app
Bluetooth connect permission has been denied.\n It can be granted from app settings to use the app
